question:
You have decided to leave your current employment. 
Write a letter to your employer. In the letter: 
• explain why you are writing
 • explain why you have decided to leave the company
 • tell your employer what you plan to do after leaving your present employment.
text: I have been working in Luberef Jeddah since the year 2019. I am writing this letter to inform you that I am going to discontinue my work from the end of next month.

This is thirty days prior notice for my resignation as I have accepted the job in Canada as a Human Resources manager. This is my dream destination, so I am requesting you to release me from my duties as per the agreement. I would like to confirm that I do not have any concerns about my current position and my sole reason for resignation is to endeavour my career in my home country. So that, I can also spend time with family.

I am thankful to you and my colleagues to be supportive in my professional journey in this company. I get so many opportunities and recognition during my working span. I would like to give you special thanks for recognition of my abilities and allowed me to perform my job duties to the fullest.
